entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Snow beginning this morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 11 February 2023
